content: Do we have a barebones template (yet) - no content, just the framework, folders, .bat / .sh?
I hammered one by trimming the SDC2 and kept updating it for my purposes. But now I would like to make one for IHE and it should be a fork of HL7's, right?
No. I hope to start working tomorrow. Arguing about a key point with Grahame right now
@Lloyd McKenzie are you running the ig_pub with only ig resource and no config file? I have not tried that yet
